ActorFrame.InitCommand:
%function(self)
local prof = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile() for pn=0,1 do _G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn] = 0 if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(pn) then local sco = 0 if GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode() then sco = prof:GetHighScoreForCourseAndTrail( GAMESTATE:GetCurrentCourse(), GAMESTATE:GetCurrentTrail(pn):GetDifficulty() ) else sco = prof:GetHighScoreForSongAndSteps( GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong(), GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSteps(pn):GetDifficulty() ) end if sco then _G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn] = math.floor(sco:GetPercentDP()*10000)/10000 end end end
end

Layer.children:
<Layer Font="_misobold small" Text="" OnCommand="x,130;y,66;zoom,.65;shadowlength,0;horizalign,right;maxwidth,240;sleep,0.5;queuecommand,Set" SetCommand="%function(self)
local pn = 0
if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(pn) then
local perc = math.floor(STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(pn):GetPercentDancePoints()*10000)/10000
--Trace(perc..' / '.._G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn])
if perc > _G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn] then self:diffuse(.6,1,.6,0) self:settext( '(+'..string.format('%.2f',100*(perc - _G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn]))..'%)' ) elseif perc < _G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn] then self:diffuse(1,.6,.6,0) self:settext( '('..string.format('%.2f',100*(perc - _G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn]))..'%)' ) else self:diffuse(1,1,1,0) self:settext( '(+'..string.format('%.2f',100*(perc - _G['uksrt_cached_highscore_'..pn]))..'%)' ) end
self:linear(.4) self:diffusealpha(1)
end
end" />
